review: Makes it easy to share on the big screen.
author: Rollie Miller

review: Good value for price, although really relevant for dumber TV's (newer ones all have netflix built in). Am hoping for more apps to be released on phone to support.
author: Ali H. "Ali"

review: Best value for the money. Netflix, Hulu, Plex, Pandora, streaming from laptop all work great.
author: Alex Dovenmuehle

review: Currently doesn't have much use besides streaming YouTube videos and music to a TV but seems like it has great potential
author: Usmaan Bajwa

review: Very useful little gadget, to connect music, netflix, and other apps to your non-smart tv
author: Evan Shaffer "IvanDrago"

review: Have bought a couple of these so far. Love them. Having a great time using them. Love that they completely replicate my Samsung S5 phone.
author: Steve W

review: Amazing product easy to use with all devices
author: Jamal Daoud
